name: LittleStorm's Zoo
description:
LittleStorm's Zoo is the children's dice game, fun and educational with the sweet animals on dice.

Think carefully when you choose what animals to collect.

You may roll the dice 3 times to achieve the right combinations, or as many of each animal as possible.

LittleStorm's Zoo can be played by 1-4 players on iPad and iPhone.

The game has won the following prizes:
- Family Review Center: Best of The Year
- Family Review Center: Seal of Approval

Have fun!
